p_65: Dashes ("-") indicate data for a particular field are not provided for this program in Residency Explorer. Reasons why data are not being provided can vary (e.g., they are not reported or available, they are not applicable, or they are based on an insufficient number of people for reporting purposes).

th_100: # of Residents Who Were Graduates of a Joint MD-PhD program
p_103: We take pride in a warm and collegial environment, with an exceptional staff and high faculty-to-resident ratio. Our comprehensive curriculum is designed to prepare trainees for the core examination, fellowship and provide a solid foundation in all aspects of radiology to prepare residents for either private practice or academic radiology. It is balanced with an abundance of research and clinical opportunities.
